result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.html: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: People started getting off the train.
result.ga: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.orig: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.html: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.

result.eng: He knew his health was getting worse.
result.ga: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip air
result.orig: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip air
result.html: Thuig sé go raibh an tsláinte ag teip airHe knew his health was getting worse.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sé go raiḃ an tsláinte ag teip airHe knew his health was getting worse.

result.eng: The famine in Sudan is getting worse.
result.ga: Tá an gorta sa tSúdáin ag dul in olcas
result.orig: Tá an gorta sa tSúdáin ag dul in olcas
result.html: Tá an gorta sa tSúdáin ag dul in olcasThe famine in Sudan is getting worse.
result.ponchtml: Tá an gorta sa tSúdáin ag dul in olcasThe famine in Sudan is getting worse.

result.html: Tá mé ag éirí tuirseachI am getting tired.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag éirí tuirseaċI am getting tired.

result.eng: It is getting better all the time.
result.ga: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fad
result.orig: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fad
result.html: Tá sé ag dul i bhfeabhas an t-am ar fadIt is getting better all the time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag dul i ḃfeaḃas an t-am ar fadIt is getting better all the time.

result.html: Tá sé ag éirí deacairIt is getting difficult.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag éirí deacairIt is getting difficult.

result.html: Tá sé ag éirí dorchaIt is getting dark.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag éirí dorċaIt is getting dark.

result.html: Tá sé ag éirí dorchaIt is getting dark.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag éirí dorċaIt is getting dark.

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.orig: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.html: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ponchtml: Tá mo ḃean ag coinneáil go maiṫ an baḃta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ga: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.orig: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úr
result.html: Dé Domhnaigh bím ag obair - ag déanamh réidh don tseachtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.
result.ponchtml: Dé Doṁnaiġ bím ag obair - ag déanaṁ réiḋ don tseaċtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ga: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.orig: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.html: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.ga: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
